message: Bob, I have a fantastic product that I believe will be of great value to you. It's worth at least $15,000 to me, and I know it will be equally valuable for your needs. I'm offering it to you at a price of $15,500. This is a limited-time opportunity, as I have another buyer who is willing to pay the full $15,000. Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss the details further.
